name: Street Race Police Chase
description:
Currently FREE With Limited Cop Cars.

Cops are here and they are gonna get you. Buckle up and get ready for action, adventure full of thrill and breathtaking ride.

Time to put paddle on accelerator & drift wheels to push car to its limit. Fantastic cars are here waiting for their drivers with babes to help you through the map

KEY FEATURES

● Real Extreme Competition
● Extremely Super Cars & Easy Controls
● Incredible Car Upgrades & Customize
● WiFi Single-Player Racing
● Global Circuit Race

GAMEPLAY

● Tilt to steer
● Touch gas button to accelerate
● Touch brake button to slow down

Lets burn rubbers take out wheels to play an exiting car racing game in town.

Plenty of cop cars in garage that will make your race a hell route & try to stop you but you need to drift and drive with full throttle, NOS is there to help you out so put out your driving skills and impress a lot of babes to hang out with.

Impressive Features that ll take your breath away

● Highway Tunnels
● Sprints
● Drag
● Drifts
● Sports Car
● Cool Tracks
● Awesome Graphics
● Easy Controls

All this in one package STREET RACE POLICE CHASE. Download hurry before the game gets Paid.
